name: docusaurus
description: Opinionated documentation skill built on Diátaxis framework
author: Vipul Gupta (@vipulgupta2048)
philosophy: Documentation isn't about documenting—it's about enabling.
opinions: Every doc must answer: what can the reader DO after reading this?
Never mix tutorials, how-tos, reference, and explanation
Inclusive language is required, not optional
Start minimal, add complexity only when needed
